entries.title: Artificial Intelligence-Powered ‘Robot Lawyer’ to Represent Human in Court Next Month
entries.description: Attendees take pictures and interact with the Engineered Arts Ameca humanoid robot with artificial intelligence as it is demonstrated during the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas, Nevada, on Jan. 5, 2022. (Patrick T. Fallon/AFP via Getty Images)

entries.title: Social Media Bosses Could Face Jail If They Breach Rules on Children Under UK’s Online Safety Bill
entries.description: A child using a computer in an undated file photo. (Peter Byrne/PA Media)

entries.title: New Jersey Prohibits Use of TikTok and 14 Other Social Media Apps on State-Owned Devices
entries.description: The TikTok app logo in an illustration taken on Aug. 22, 2022. (Dado Ruvic/Reuters)

entries.title: FAA Proposes Requiring 5G Safeguards on Planes by Early 2024
entries.description: Airline passengers walk inside the Tampa International Airport as airports around the country are awaiting for Verizon and AT&T to rollout their 5G technology in Tampa, Fla., on Jan. 19, 2022. (Octavio Jones/Reuters)
